benchmark_details.name: SSLD-200 (Song Structure and Lyric Dataset)
benchmark_details.overview: The SSLD-200 dataset comprises 200 songs, 100 Chinese and 100 English, collected from YouTube with detailed structural information and lyrics, aimed at evaluating structured lyrics recognition.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To provide a standardized dataset for evaluating structured lyrics recognition models.

data.source: Songs collected from YouTube, containing both audio and corresponding lyrics.
data.annotation: Manual annotations of structure and lyrics for each song.

methodology.calculation: Metrics are calculated based on the output of structure analysis and lyric recognition modules.
methodology.interpretation: Lower DER indicates better structural accuracy, and lower WER indicates better lyric transcription accuracy.
methodology.validation: Evaluated on the proposed SSLD-200 dataset.
